item.title: Adding a COVID certificate link to the iPhone home screen
item.description: iPhone home screen link Here in Colombia our COVID vaccine certificates are available as a PDF document. Opening a PDF in the phone is easy, but what about finding the PDF in the first place? That’s what this post is about, creating a home screen link, like for any other app, to open the PDF First, make sure to have the PDF available directly on the phone. In my case, I have the PDF available in the OneDrive App, but since I want this to work even offline, I need to copy the PDF locally Click on the top right to open the share dialog, then click on “Share File via…”
